AboutSection.title: About SFMA
AboutSection.description: The Saudi Facilities Management Association (SFMA) is a non-profit organization established on 1441/11/9 AH, corresponding to 2020/6/30 AD, under the supervision of the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development. It aims to promote the concept of facilities management as a key partner in achieving the Kingdom’s Vision 2030, through a comprehensive strategic plan that seeks to achieve inclusive and sustainable development, through effective partnerships between the public and private sectors and the third sector, to support national development in all aspects of facilities management and its diverse services.
AboutSection.QouteSection: "Success stories always begin with a vision, and the most successful visions are those built on the strength of a vibrant society, a thriving economy, and an ambitious nation."

AboutSection.title: About SFMA
AboutSection.description: The Saudi Facilities Management Association was established as part of the advancement towards a prosperous future for Saudi Arabia, in line with its ambitious vision to enhance its national presence and align with Vision 2030. SFMA initiated a comprehensive strategic plan for the coming years to achieve integrated and direct development in all aspects of facilities management and services. Our aim is to be a professional association that seeks to develop and enhance the profession and those working in it. Its roles include setting standards and practice guidelines, licensing requirements, establishing rules and exams for obtaining professional certificates, conducting studies and research, organizing training courses, holding professional seminars and conferences, and offering consultancy services in its field, according to the council and member-set regulations. Ultimately, we aim to be the hub for all facility management professionals.

MotivatorsSection.title: Motivators
MotivatorsSection.description: Towards a prosperous future, driven by innovation, sustainability, and security

OurVisionSection.title: Our Vision
OurVisionSection.description: The destination for facilities management experts and success partners in Saudi Arabia
OurVisionSection.content: To be the primary reference in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia for enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of facilities management, contributing to the realization of Vision 2030 by advancing the facilities management sector and offering best global practices. This includes building a comprehensive professional community that supports innovation and sustainability, facilitates knowledge sharing and expertise exchange, and improves the quality of facilities, boosts performance, and strengthens the sector's competitiveness locally and globally.

OurGoalsSection.title: Our Goals
OurGoalsSection.description: We work to develop facilities management and enhance its efficiency to achieve sustainable development that meets future aspirations
OurGoalsSection.p_1: Knowledge and experience exchange among facilities management professionals
OurGoalsSection.p_2: Participation in national development goals in alignment with Saudi Arabia’s Vision
OurGoalsSection.p_3: Development of FM standards based on our built environment and culture
OurGoalsSection.p_4: Provision of research and studies in FM
OurGoalsSection.p_5: Professional development in FM both scientifically and technically

PillarsSection.title: SFMA Pillar System
PillarsSection.description: An integrated system that enhances the efficiency and sustainability of the association, based on best practices to achieve institutional excellence

ValuesSection.title: Our Values
ValuesSection.sub_title: We are grounded in solid principles that promote excellence and commitment, aiming to elevate the facilities management sector toward a sustainable future.

PoliciesSearch.title: Policies and Procedures

Institutions.title: Institution Memberships
Institutions.sub_title: Join the Saudi Facility Management Association to enhance your market presence, benefit from collaboration opportunities and partnerships, and participate in events that contribute to sector development and sustainability.

Individuals.title: Individual Memberships
Individuals.sub_title: Be part of a professional community that enables you to develop your skills, connect with experts, and benefit from advanced knowledge resources that support your career in facility management.

Volunteers.title: Volunteer Memberships
Volunteers.sub_title: Make a real impact in the facility management sector by volunteering in the association's initiatives, gain valuable experience, expand your professional network, and contribute to building a sustainable and prosperous future for the field.
